subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: No. 4 Kansas marched to an 81-68 victory over No. 13 Memphis at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday, thanks to the efforts of Markieff Morris and his twin brother, Marcus.
snippet: No. 4 Kansas marched to an 81-68 victory over No. 13 Memphis at Madison Square Garden on Tuesday, thanks to the efforts of Markieff Morris and his twin brother, Marcus.
